scripts.clean: rimraf lib && rimraf packages/*/lib && rimraf examples/pages/**/*.vue && rimraf tests/**/coverage && rimraf coverage
scripts.build:utils: cross-env BABEL_ENV=utils babel src --out-dir lib --ignore src/index.js
scripts.build:file: npm run build:icon & npm run build:entry & npm run build:i18n & node build/bin/gen-cssfiles & node build/bin/version.js
scripts.build:theme: gulp build --gulpfile packages/theme-albatro/gulpfile.js && cp-cli packages/theme-albatro/lib lib/theme-albatro
scripts.build:packages: vue-cli-service build --target lib --dest lib --no-clean --name albatro ./packages/index.ts && node build/bin/build-components2.js
scripts.build:dev: npm run clean && vue-cli-service build --mode development --dest lib --no-clean --dest examples/arbatro-ui
scripts.build:deploy: npm run clean && npm run build:file && vue-cli-service serve --mode production && echo gavinhome.gitee.io/albatro>>examples/albatro-ui/CNAME
scripts.dev: npm run clean && npm run build:file && npm run serve && npm run build:template
scripts.dev:play: npm run clean && npm run build:file && vue-cli-service serve --mode play && npm run build:template
scripts.dist: npm run clean && npm run build:file && npm run lint && npm run build:utils && npm run build:umd && npm run build:theme && npm run build:lib && npm run build:components && npm run build:packages
scripts.lib: vue-cli-service build --target lib --name albatro-ui --dest lib src/index.js
scripts.pub: npm run bootstrap1 && sh build/git-release.sh && sh build/release.sh && node build/bin/gen-indices.js && sh build/deploy.sh
